title: We Make a Ton of Money… Where Did It All Go? (Hour 3)
description:
George Kamel & Rachel Cruze discuss:

How to choose a mortgage lender,

What to do with a 401(k) from a previous company,

Figuring out where all your money goes when you're not paying attention,

Using extra money for savings or paying off debt,

How much money to save for an emergency fund,

Investing vs. saving for a house.


Have a question for the show? Call 888-825-5225 Weekdays from 2-5pm CT

Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6

Learn more about your ad choices. https://www.megaphone.fm/adchoices
Ramsey Solutions Privacy Policy
